programme.title: Kuroko’s Basketball 2nd Season Ep11
programme.desc: Don't Be Ridiculous - Persuaded by Hyuga and Riko, injured Kiyoshi leaves the court. Hyuga promises him they will become no.1 in Japan.

programme.title: Kuroko’s Basketball 2nd Season Ep12
programme.desc: Thanks - Seirin advances to Winter Cup, so all members go to the onsen to relax. On their way, they meet Too Academy.

programme.title: Kuroko’s Basketball 2nd Season Ep13
programme.desc: Definitely This Time - Kagami visits his coach in the US to practise his kill. Later, Winter Cup starts. Seirin is against Too.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Man Who Abandoned "Lupin" - Lupin is shot and Albert obtains the notebook. However, Albert is also shot and the notebook falls into Jose’s hands.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep10
programme.desc: Thief And Thief - Lupin confronts Albert. After interrogating Guillaume, they learn the shocking truth behind Jose’s terrifying plot.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep11
programme.desc: Get Pablo’s Collection - While enjoying a peaceful New Year, Lupin discovers a medal and starts reminiscing about past adventures.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd Part 5 Ep12
programme.desc: The Extravagance Of Goemon Ishikawa XIII - Goemon is keeping watching of Chloe, a beautiful woman who inherited a treasure and is Lupin’s new target.

programme.title: Mitsuboshi Colors Ep11
programme.desc: Hyper Hide And Seek - The girls decide to undergo ‘training’ with a game of hyper hide-and-seek. Yui is tasked to find the other two using her walkie talkie.

programme.title: Mitsuboshi Colors Ep12
programme.desc: Colors, The Town, And The People - The girls film a video to showcase the town and the people that they are protecting. In the meantime, cherry blossoms are blooming in the parks.

programme.title: The Helpful Fox Senko-San Ep1
programme.desc: I’m Going To Pamper Him To His Heart’s Content - Overworked Nakano returns home one day and finds a young girl with fox ears and tail cooking a meal in his kitchen.

programme.title: The Helpful Fox Senko-San Ep2
programme.desc: Don’T Be Shy Now - Nakano wakes up and sees Senko in his room, therefore realizing that everything from last night was not a dream.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep1
programme.desc: Yuko Awakens! For Family Reasons You’re Now A Demon Girl - Yuko wakes up one morning and finds herself having horns and a tail. She learns the shocking truth from her mother.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep2
programme.desc: Just How Sporty Are You!? Everything Is Fluctuating - The difference in strength between Yuko and Momo is too great, and Yuko decides to undergo special training.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep3
programme.desc: Nightmare Or Forebear!? The Doorstop Of Darkness Descends - Yuko meets her ancestor in her dream and is given some advice. However, she forgets everything when she wakes up.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep4
programme.desc: Sharpen Your Mind!! The Newly Awakened Powers Of The Magical Girl - Momo discovers a switch underneath the statue. Flipping it on, they discover it allows Lilith to possess Yuko’s body.

programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep5
programme.desc: A Town Full Of Traps?? The Demon On The Brink Awakens A New Ability - Yuko wants to buy a present for her younger sister Ryoko with her leftover money. For some reason, Momo tags along.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep53
programme.desc: Stress Causes Baldness. But, Paying Too Much Attention To Preventing Stress, Builds Up Stress Again. In The End There Is Nothing That We Can Do To It. - A series of arson incidents occur in Kabuki. Trash separation becomes very serious, but Gintoki still violates the rule.

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep54

programme.title: Gintama Season 2 Ep55
programme.desc: Do Not Make That “Kuchakucha” Sound When Eating - Katsuo imposes an unreasonable challenge on Koushiro. To fight against that, Gintoki and others become hosts.

programme.desc: Take Note Of The One-Day Director - A lot of ladies have been kidnapped in Kabuki. People are upset about Shinsengumi as their management has gone too far.

programme.title: Oxenfree
programme.desc: A supernatural teen thriller about a group of friends who unwittingly open a ghostly rift. Players control Alex, who brings her new stepbrother Jonas to an overnight party gone wrong off the coast of their hometown.

programme.title: Steel Sharks
programme.desc: In this undersea thriller, a United States chemist is captured by terrorists. But a rescue attempt by an elite group of Navy Seals goes wrong when they are captured. Now they must wage a silent war beneath the waves.

programme.title: Drum
programme.desc: A hot-shot journalist is swept up in a movement to challenge Apartheid in 1950s South Africa.

programme.title: Halo Ep7
programme.desc: Inheritance - Kwan’s journey to uncover her family’s “true purpose” takes her deep into the deserts of Madrigal. Soren obsesses over unfinished business.

programme.title: Halo Ep8
programme.desc: Allegiance - John and Makee come to terms with their shared vision. Halsey has one last chance to save her mission, and herself.

programme.title: Halo Ep9
programme.desc: Transcendence - Beaten, battered, and betrayed, John 117 leads the Spartans on a suicide mission to find the Halo and save humanity.

programme.title: Halo Ep6
programme.desc: Solace - Survivors from battle return to Reach. John confronts Dr. Halsey, and the lies of his past. The new prisoner seems to know John better than he knows himself.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep12
programme.desc: WiseCrack Edition: Wild Wild West - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep13
programme.desc: WiseCrack Quick Take - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep1
programme.desc: You Better Run - A Handball champion and a Track star are just two of the competitors in the Tag Arena. They face 5 grueling courses while being hunted down by the most menacing athletes. And there’s just one rule: Don’t. Get. Caught!

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep2
programme.desc: Real Men Do Cry - Tonight, a teacher, a prankster, and a NFL hopeful are 3 of the competitors to go up against the world’s most intimidating Taggers. They must run for their lives and obey one rule: Don’t.Get.Caught!

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep5
programme.desc: Episode 5 sees the explorer travel the final 1000 miles by any means possible through Armenia and the captivating Republic of Iran, aiming for the Caspian Sea, and his journey’s end.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep1
programme.desc: Going Coastal - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 begin their epic adventure, starting in former German concession, Qingdao. They taste a wriggly local speciality; explore hidden war tunnels and head to a sleepy seaside village.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3
programme.desc: The Grasslands - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 stop off in the capital of Heilongjiang province, Harbin. From there, they venture into the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, herding camels and building their very own Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: Halo Ep6
programme.desc: Solace - Survivors from battle return to Reach. John confronts Dr. Halsey, and the lies of his past. The new prisoner seems to know John better than he knows himself.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the third leg of his four-part journey around the Mediterranean, travelling through Libya, Tunisia and across the sea to Sicily.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Cheese - Gregg Wallace is in Gateshead at a cheese factory where they produce 3000 tonnes of spreadable cheese every year.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S9 Ep4
programme.desc: Cornwall - We join Ben on the rugged cliffs of Cornwall, where he is staying with Davina and Todd and their family. Davina and Todd are a spirited couple who left the city for an empty field.

programme.title: Dynasties S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Elephant - In Kenya, an incredibly rare event pushes a struggling elephant family to its limits. To save their dynasty, they have to work together and overcome the challenge of a lifetime.

programme.desc: Aurora - The largest of all of Earth's displays stretches across thousands of kilometres in the night sky: the Aurora Borealis. programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Fires of Pele Ep4
programme.desc: The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Nova Scotia Ep2
programme.desc: At either edge of the province, Nova Scotia proves that any beach is built from raw forces in opposition, but also that balance between those forces is necessary if life is to thrive.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Nova Scotia Ep2

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Birds of Prey Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Insect Eaters Ep3
programme.desc: Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Ghosts of Cederberg Ep1
programme.desc: A rocky landscape, carved over eons by wind, water and fire, these are the Cederberg Mountains of South Africa. These imposing peaks are home to an incredible diversity of plants and animals. But there are some here that remain unseen, lurking in the shadows and ready to strike at any time...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Namib: Land Of Extremes Ep2
programme.desc: The Namib Desert is a land of extremes, from icy ocean to baking sand. It takes toughness and adaptation to live in this desert, and only a special few can. From the sidewinding adder to the fog-collecting beetle, each animal has their tricks for survival in the Namib.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - The Last Desert Giants Ep3
programme.desc: The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africa’s shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the world’s largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombia’s Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the island’s stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths who’ve now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Birds of Prey Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombia’s Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the island’s stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths who’ve now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Humpback Birth of a Giant Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whale’s life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Squirrel Monkey Island Ep2
programme.desc: Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where it’s mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Insect Eaters Ep3
programme.desc: Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4
programme.desc: From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, it’s just another day at the butcher’s counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Masters of Defence Ep5
programme.desc: Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Crowded Islands Ep4
programme.desc: On rocky islands off the coast of South Africa, thousands of creatures congregate to breed. Among these, huge colonies of cape gannets dominate. Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Return to the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - March of the Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert And The Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dinmaker Diva - A bungled attempt at a stunt leads to Dennis inadvertently becoming an internet star and Beanotown celebrity! But fame is fleeting and Dennis is soon replaced by Walter’s cat who can play the piano. Dennis has to stage the best stunt yet to gain back his fame, putting Gnasher in peril!

programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lost Sweetie - Mrs Creecher confiscates Dennis’ rare sour sweetie - The Tongue Destroyer! Dennis is desperate to get the sweet back and takes his friends on an adventure to the school’s Confiscatorium, hidden in the depths of Bash Street School!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep54

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby'S Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Escape From Azka-Bash - Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it – unless the mysterious note giver stops him first!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Griller Thriller - Dennis’ ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster, Galahad – only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so torn up that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game / The Fin-ale - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV. // When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Save a Walrus - When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.desc: Bob and Clemmons' Excellent Adventure / The Man With No Name With A Name - We pull back the curtain to see how Firemen Bob and Clemmons retrieve the bizarre requests of Chief Freya during a typical emergency. // It's an old west showdown, when a new adversary rolls into town.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep104
programme.desc: I Named It Whiskers / How Angus Got His Groove Back - After one of Lily's inventions goes haywire, she enlists Parker's help to get it back under control. // Angus loses his lucky beanie, which causes him to revert back to being a child.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Sick as a Chipmunk - After caring for a sick Brittany, Eleanor and Jeanette wonder if Brittany would care for them if they were sick.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Instant Gram - Dave gets an 'Instant Gram' account and after several embarrassing posts, Alvin does all he can to stop him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Of Mice and Munks - The Chipettes fall in love with a cute little mouse that's doomed to be fed to a snake as part of a science class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Simon Saves the World - Simon's new invention threatens to destroy the world, creating a time loop and changing gravity inside the house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep226
programme.desc: We Did A Bad Thing - When their secret identities gets out, Danger Force will stop at nothing to prevent their parents from finding out who is behind their masks.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Supernova, Part 2 - As the Federation hangs in the balance, the crew must make the ultimate sacrifice to save Starfleet's future.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Present Tense / Any Given Sundae - Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Valentine's Day of Horror - Nate has decided this Valentine's Day, he will finally profess his love for his dream girl in the form of a grand gesture, but the day of love quickly turns into a nightmare after Nate's "gift" gives the entire school food poisoning.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep84
programme.desc: Spy Buddies / Boat Smarts / Good Old Whatshisname - Determined to uncover Plankton’s next plot, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob and Patrick to spy on him. // Watch an instructional video on boating techniques with Squidward and SpongeBob. // Mr. Krabs holds a contest for his employees.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep94
programme.desc: Mermaid Man vs. Sponge - Plankton has brainwashed Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Roadie to Nowhere / A Fridge Too Far - After learning that Chunk was like her in high school, Luna worries her ambition to be a rocker is unrealistic. // When food Lincoln has saved in the fridge gets taken, a territory war in the fridge ensues.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Selfie Improvement / No Place Like Homeschool - When Carol Pingrey's photo gets more likes on social media than Lori's she tries to one-up her. // Lola is being temporarily homeschooled. Thinking it looks like fun, the other kids try to get in on it.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Premium Parker / Toast of the Town - Parker makes some bougie new friends while the Middlemost Post is on vacation. // Angus and Parker compete in a toast-making contest hosted by Ms. Pam and The Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep17
programme.desc: Arrgh! / Rock Bottom - A pretend search for gold turns into a real treasure hunt. // SpongeBob gets on the wrong bus and finds himself lost in a mysterious part of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep18
programme.desc: Texas / Walking Small - Sandy is homesick and plans to return home. // The evil Plankton is up to no good once again when he tries to manipulate SpongeBob.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep19
programme.desc: Fools In April / Neptune's Spatula - Squidward decides to teach SpongeBob a REAL April Fool's Day prank, but finds out being mean doesn't necessarily mean funny. // SpongeBob seizes the mythical spatula of King Neptune.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep20
programme.desc: Hooky / Mermaid Man II - Mr. Krabs warns SpongeBob and Patrick to beware the dangerous fishing hooks! // SpongeBob joins Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy on patrol..

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Bad Po - Po disobeys Shifu's orders and looks into the Mystical Mirror of Yin and Yang, creating two versions of himself: one good and one evil!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep114
programme.desc: My Favorite Yao - When Temutai kidnaps a kung fu master, Shifu turns to Po for help.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Jet - While traveling towards the North Pole, the group almost gets captured by the Fire Nation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Operation: Cooties - King Julien observes children chasing each other, calling out "cooties". He deduces that girls pass this wretched "cooties" with a simple touch.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep122
programme.desc: An Elephant Never Forgets / Otter Things Have Happened - When Burt the elephant asks the penguins to help him sneak out of the zoo, they take on the challenge and get the big guy out. // Marlene catches a glimpse of Fred the squirrel and falls in love at first sight.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Miss Understanding / Over Phil - When Alice mentions that one of the penguins is actually female, Skipper has an identity crisis. // After a big fight Mason moves out-and in with the penguins. Unfortunately, Mason is a very annoying house guest.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Pondgea's Got Talent / Raging Mole - When Pumpers holds a talent show, SwaySway must overcome his stage fright to perform a love song for Jenny Quackles. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce convince the Bread Maker to lose a wrestling match to Lava Mole.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Dorg Wants a Laugh / Dorg Wants a Day Off - Patronella casts a spell and now one can look at Dorg without laughing! // When the gang fakes being sick for a day off, Dorg ends up in the hospital for real! He'll need to bust out and get back to school to find a cure!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Bumblebee Magnetic Karaoke Hippo / Time Out - Felicity helps a mashup creature to realize his true potential. // To avoid a visit to Dr. Lotzashots, Felicity borrows Father Time's watch.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Laked Nake / Doom Baby - The dudes' decision to babysit Richard Dickson might cost Craig his life. // A good day at the lake goes bad when Sanjay loses his bathing suit.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep119

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep3B/Ep55B/Ep108B/Ep13B/Ep65B/Ep118B/Ep23B
programme.desc: Leaf It Alone/The Color of Bunny/Papa's Got A Brand New Sam/The Spy Who Bugged Me/Easter Tweets/Dorlock and the Disorient Express/Coyote. Rabbit. Squirrel - Wile E. Coyote attempts to show Bugs the future of yard maintenance, with limited results.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep4/Ep48
programme.desc: Fish And Visitors/Gossamer Is Awesomer - Bugs and Daffy quickly discover that Yosemite Sam is a less-than-perfect houseguest when they are forced to take him in during a rainstorm. But how to get him to leave?

programme.title: Roger Ep143/Ep144/Ep145/Ep153/Ep154/Ep148/Ep156
programme.desc: Yes, No… It All Depends/What's Important Is Taking Part… And Not Losing/The Secret/Booster Shot/So Embarrassing/Gilbart/Bright Lights - Today, Roger and Fatou, helpful as ever, reply to demands from all their friends, no matter how silly or useless they happen to be. Our friends realize they just can’t say NO. So with help from Roger 3000, they begin a training program that is supposed to help them learn to say...NO! Of course everything gets out of hand and our two friends are horrified to learn that they are now incapable of saying YES! Another round of “reverse training” and our heroes immediately say YES to the crabs without even knowing why! Which is how they find themselves suddenly living in a house along with thousands of crabs from all the surrounding islands. Moral of the story: sometimes you should say YES sometimes NO, but it all depends right?

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep16/Ep62/Ep76/Ep118/Ep8/Ep86/Ep124/Ep20

programme.title: Roger Ep150/Ep151/Ep152/Ep160/Ep161/Ep155/Ep163
programme.desc: Wake-Up Call/Roger's Choice/Surprise Party/Lousy Lice/Raindrops KeEp.Falling On My Head/Show Time/Blind As A Pad - Because Junior complains that Fatou is always late, the little girl asks Roger to build her an infallible alarm clock. Unfortunately, despite Roger’s warnings, she opens it up. And an atomic shock wave wafts out of the alarm clock and surrounds the entire island, provoking a very bizarre temporal malfunction for each of the island’s inhabitants. Each animal is prisoner of a time warp and repeats over and over the same action. The unexpected consequence of Fatou’s screw-up is that the entire island is now threatened with sinking into the ocean! Fatou and Roger just barely manage to repair the alarm clock in time and save the island. Whew...that was close!

programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: A Bedtime Routine
programme.desc: On those hot, humid summer nights, nothing can get in the way of sleep like mosquitoes on the hunt. We learn about the tools the Edo townspeople had at their disposal to fight the pesky insects.

programme.title: NHK World Selection
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
